content: any issues with the pattern please email me at creativelycritter@gmail com or send me an instagram dm don t forget to use the hashtag #nonnadishcloth and tag me on instagram so that i can see your finished cloths i can t wait to see you rock your new dishcloths xo noelle instagram - @creativecritter etsy https //www etsy com/shop/thecreativecritterco ravelry creative-critter this pattern is a copyright of noelle souza of the creative critter no part of this pattern or photos may be used for resale purposes dishcloths made with this pattern may be sold in small quantities less than 10 with written consent of noelle souza of the creative critter the-creative-critter com instagram @creativecritter 3
